text: læa brrda bukhkhl chan na cak pracha cha ti khxng firˌ xea n di klaw wa than ca plxy mu sa læa phwkphxng khxng khea wi pheux kx khwam seiyhay nı phændin læa laley than læa brrda thi khearph sakkara khxng than kranan hrux khea klaw wa rea ca kha brrda lukchay khxng phwk khea læa wi chiwit brrda hying khxng phwk khea læa thæcring rea pen phu mi kalang xanac henux phwk khea
